dialog.ban_description: Are you sure you want to ban {email}? They will be unable to access the app.
dialog.unban_description: Are you sure you want to unban {email}? They will regain access to the app.
dialog.revoke_description: Are you sure you want to revoke all sessions for {email}? They will be logged out everywhere.
dialog.set_role_description: Are you sure you want to change the role of {email} to {role}?
dialog.impersonation_active_description: Please reload the page to be logged in as the impersonated user.

errors.password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter

errors.verification_invalid: Invalid or expired verification code. Please try again.

hero.description: Bring your SaaS to life in minutes, not months. Open-source template loaded with the tech that gets you shipping.
hero.tagline: Focus on your product and ship faster.
hero.title: SaaS Starter Template

autumn_stripe.description: Autumn handles billing, feature gates, and usage tracking—no webhook complexity. Stripe for payment processing.
autumn_stripe.title: Autumn + Stripe

convex.description: The open source Firebase alternative. Built on PostgreSQL - world's most advanced relational database.
convex.title: Convex

posthog.description: PostHog is an open-source product analytics platform to track user behavior and measure conversions.
posthog.title: PostHog

shadcn_svblocks.description: A set of beautifully-designed, accessible components built with Tailwind CSS v4 and Bits UI.
shadcn_svblocks.title: Shadcn Svelte + SVBlocks

svelte.description: The most lovved frontend framework. A simple, performant, and future-proof way to build your web app.
svelte.title: Svelte 5

tolgee.description: Internationalization done right. In-context editing and ML-powered translation for a seamless localization workflow.
tolgee.title: Tolgee

better_auth.description: The most comprehensive authentication library for TypeScript. Sessions, OAuth, passkeys, and multi-tenancy out of the box.
better_auth.title: Better Auth

resend.description: The email API for developers. Build and send transactional emails with a modern, reliable API built for scale.
resend.title: Resend

sentry.description: Application monitoring and error tracking. Identify issues before your users do with real-time alerts and detailed stack traces.
sentry.title: Sentry

integrations.description: Super fast solutions that are actually fun to build with
integrations.title: Real 2025 Developer Experience

about.description: Meet the talented team behind our product
about.title: About Us - Meet Our Team

home.description: The ultimate SaaS starter template with SvelteKit, Convex, and modern web technologies. Build your brand in minutes, not weeks. Focus on your product and ship faster.
home.title: Build & Ship Your Product Faster

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences.

account.title: Account Information
account.name_helper: This is your public display name.
account.profile_picture_helper: Upload an image or paste a link. We recommend a square image under 2MB.
account.file_helper: PNG, JPG, or GIF up to 2MB.
account.url_helper: Paste an image link instead of uploading.

password.title: Change Password
password.description: Update your password to keep your account secure.
password.password_helper: Must be at least 10 characters long.
password.revoke_sessions_label: Sign out of all other devices
password.security_notice_description: Changing your password will require you to sign in again on all devices unless you uncheck the option above.

email.title: Email Address
email.description: Update your email address for account notifications and login.
email.verification_required_description: A verification email will be sent to your current email address. You must approve the change before your new email becomes active.
email.not_verified_description: Your current email is not verified. The new email will be updated immediately without verification.

security.title: Security
security.description: Manage your passkeys and security settings.
security.passkey_info_description: Passkeys are a secure, passwordless way to sign in. They use biometrics or device PIN and are stored securely on your devices.
security.add_passkey_helper: Give your passkey a name to identify which device it's registered on.
security.no_passkeys: You haven't registered any passkeys yet.

pricing.description: This SaaS starter template is completely free and open source.
pricing.description_autumn: Test the integrated payment system powered by Autumn - an open-source billing platform that handles subscriptions, usage limits, and Stripe webhooks automatically.
pricing.title: Pricing that Scales with You

team.description: During the working process, we perform regular fitting with the client because he is the only person who can feel whether a new suit fits or not.
team.title: Our dream team
